message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
